short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the most important thing done today

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of having todos to never complete them?
Do you feel busy all the time, but don't feel like making meaningful progress?

Remember, less is more.

Define you ONE most important thing to get done today, and actually get it done.

Ask your self,

“What’s the ONE Thing you can do today such that by doing it everything else would be easier or unnecessary?”

1) define your ONE thing
2) set a deadline
3) get reminded of it every time you open a new tab.
